name: Todoist
note: Updated 4 Nov 2022: optional project name and due date; support formatted text; and uses for Todoist REST API v2.
description: Add the selected text as a task in Todoist.

options.label: Project name
options.description: Name of a project to add tasks to. Leave blank for Inbox.

options.label: Section name
options.description: Name of a section to add tasks to. Leave blank for no section.

options.label: Due date
options.description: Due date in natural language e.g. "today", "tomorrow at 4pm", "in 3 days", "monday". Leave blank for no due date.
